message.content:
{"id": "116744", "title": "Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect", "description": "The dynamic text element's Content Type property does not have any effect on the displayed results.", "OB": "The dynamic text element's Content Type property is expected to control the way the content is displayed.", "EB": "Regardless of the value set in the dynamic text element's Content Type property (Auto, Plain, or HTML), the report always displays the same results. The expected results are as follows:

1. For Plain, the literal content (tags and all) should be displayed.
2. For Auto, content 1, 2, and 3 should appear properly without any HTML or RTF tags.
3. For HTML, content 1 and 2 should appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 should appear literally with RTF tags.", "SR": "Please investigate and fix the issue causing the dynamic text element's Content Type property to have no effect on the displayed results. The expected behavior should align with the descriptions provided for each Content Type option."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '116744', 'title': 'Bug 116744Dynamic text content type has no effect', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': "The reportdisplays the same results whether I set the dynamic text element's Content Typeproperty to Auto, Plain, or HTML.Expected results:For Plain, I expect the literal content (tags and all) to be displayed.For Auto, I expect content 1, 2 and 3 to appear properly without HTML or RTFtags.For HTML, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, andcontent 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.See attached report. ", 'SR': ''}
